extensionDescription.message: Removes content that contains unwanted keywords for peace of mind

statusNotRunning.message: Filter is enabled and on stand-by

statusPermDisabled.message: Filter is disabled for this site

maxDimensions.message: Maximum size of elements to hide:

settingsDescription.message: Manage words and n-grams that should be filtered. Regular expressions are supported (but not required), upper- or lowercase does not matter

wordsListDescription.message: Words are separated by (western) punctuation marks or spaces

ngramsListDescription.message: n-Grams can occour anywhere. You can also use them for words in languages without word-separation. Careful: Short (english) n-Grams can lead to problems with some web pages
